session module¶

This module defines the game session.

FUNCTIONS

init()

wait()

check_quit()

check_game_over()

DATA

status


session.check_game_over()¶

Check is the game over.


session.check_quit()¶

Check the quit event.


session.init()¶

Reset all to start.


session.status = {'game_over': False, 'running': False, 'waiting': True}¶

Game conditions.


session.wait()¶

Waiting for player choice.
